title: Luxury Penthouse with Skyline View
description: Elegant penthouse with breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. This luxury unit features high ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows, and premium finishes throughout. The open kitchen includes top-of-the-line appliances and a large island. The primary suite has a spa-like bathroom and a walk-in closet. Residents enjoy premium building amenities including a rooftop pool, fitness center, and 24/7 doorman service.

title: Modern Downtown Loft
description: Stunning downtown loft with industrial chic design elements. Features exposed brick walls, concrete floors with radiant heating, and large windows bringing abundant natural light. The open floor plan includes a chef's kitchen with high-end appliances. Located in a historic building with modern amenities, steps away from restaurants, shopping, and transportation.

title: Suburban Family Home
description: Charming family home in a quiet suburban neighborhood. This two-story house features a bright, open-concept main floor with hardwood throughout. The kitchen has been recently renovated with quartz countertops and new appliances. Upstairs you'll find four spacious bedrooms and a renovated main bathroom. The finished basement provides additional living space. The private backyard has a deck perfect for entertaining.

title: Waterfront Luxury Villa
description: Spectacular waterfront villa with unobstructed ocean views. This architectural masterpiece features soaring ceilings, walls of glass, and premium finishes throughout. The gourmet kitchen opens to a spacious family room with stunning water views. The primary suite includes a private terrace, custom walk-in closets, and a spa-like bathroom. Outside, enjoy the infinity pool, outdoor kitchen, and direct beach access.

title: Downtown Office Space
description: Premium office space in a prime downtown location. This contemporary workspace features an open floor plan that can be customized to your business needs. Includes high-speed internet infrastructure, modern meeting rooms, and a stylish reception area. The building offers 24/7 security, underground parking, and proximity to public transportation.

title: Retail Space in Shopping Center
description: Prime retail space in a popular shopping center with excellent visibility and foot traffic. This corner unit features large display windows, high ceilings, and flexible layout options. The property includes a small office area, customer bathroom, and rear storage space with loading access. Located in a busy commercial district with complementary businesses and ample parking.
